Desc.eng: The monsters destroyed everything! Help me!
Here is 50 gold. Grab a bite.
My apologies, but I need everything I have.
Listen to me, stranger! Word on the street is that you are looking for explosives. Is that right? I could help you, if you help me.
Here is 100 gold. And a word of advice… only the truth, please.
I wouldn’t dream of lying to you, sir! There is a ratman in the port. He is called Arkady, a fence dealing in forbidden goods.
I don’t need your help. I work alone.
100 gold! That’s enough. I want my pony!
50 gold? And I still have to wear these rags?
